welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dewsbury, a charming town known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves as a base for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
